allow: Bash(curl -s http://localhost:8000/ai-agent -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""query"": ""Tell me about Thief of Sorrows""}")

Bash(python -c "import sys, json; data=json.load(sys.stdin); print(''''Mode:'''', data[''''search_results''''][''''mode'''']); print(''''Agent Available:'''', data[''''search_results''''][''''agent_available'''']); print(''''Search Target:'''', data[''''search_results''''].get(''''search_target'''', ''''N/A'''')); print(''''\nFinal Response (first 200 chars):'''', data[''''final_response''''][:200])")
